ygData.subject: Re: Will not sufficient??
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, I bought it. Does anyone here like to camp a few days for a weapon? ... Not really. To me, earning plats to buy something is equal to obtaining it
ygData.messageBody:
>so you bought it, eh? or got a friend to get it for you?

Yes, I bought it. Does anyone here like to camp a few days for a weapon?



>to me, it is not the same of going in and obtaining the item yourself,
>truelly earning it and rightuosly owning it...

Not really. To me, earning plats to buy something is equal to obtaining it
yourself. For example, why not build your own computer (ie. coding and
building mainframes) in oppose to buying it? The reason that there is a
price for everything is because they are an equal trade-off. Money =
Material, therefore, My Hard Work = Dark Reaver + other nice stuff that
would otherwise be looted on RZ.



>and if this Xillith would kill her own brethren for valuable items, I would
>consider her a traitor...I say this due to the remark that was said. The
>Indigo Brotherhood will not tolerate kinslayers of any reputation.

She lost her cool there. I always respected Xillith for her role-playing and
helpfulness, but I guess all that looting of plats on RZ is starting to make
her jealous of something she cannot obtain.


"I earned all that I have" - Xillith
